acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Charles City County (Va.) under accession number 40581.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Charles City County was named for Charles I of England and was one of the eight shires established in 1634. Its area is 204 square miles, and the county seat is Charles City.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Charles City County (Va.) Wills, 1789-1920, consists of Will Books with Indexes.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Charles City County Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm."
